Title: Silverlight Forms Toolkit
Description: This projects helps to build forms within Silverlight business applications.
HomeWiki:
Welcome to the Silverlight Forms Toolkit!

About this project

This projects helps to build forms within Silverlight business applications.

How to get started?

  • Download the latest release
  • or Get the source code
  • View the online demo

How can I improve this project?

  • Add bugs or feature requests to the Issue Tracker
  • Discuss problems or missing features in the Forum
  • Become a member

Project overview

This is the component part of the toolkit. The toolkit containts (at the moment) 3 projects. This one, the Business Application Toolkit and the Validation Framwork.



How to become a member?

Contact me and give some reasons why.
